Content-Type: text/plain; charset=US-ASCII
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi,

 

I had some difficulty in promoting TDD in my team (if you can call it
so, too many short-term body-shopped personnel, with no TDD skills), so
I started investigating some tools that permit generating unit tests "a
posteriori". 

Would anyone like to share some experience with this type of tools,
since they integrate better with traditional approach, contrary to
"write test first". 

 

Thank you,

 

Danijel Arsenovski
